settings.title: I made this design specifically for our step by step tutorial.

settings.editor: It allows me to show you how easy it can be to make an amazing website - by simply following along with me.

settings.editor: We've made the design super easy to adapt to any industry, so you can use it to build any type of website.

settings.editor: It is also super easy to update. For example, you can change the colors and fonts sitewide with a single click.
